resources.string: What is the name given to the person who is very accurate in thinking?

●This test consist questions from Science and Mathematics sections.
●There will be 30 questions and 60 minutes will be given to attempt the test, with 4 marks each.
●Each question has four options.Each section is compulsory.
●Only one option is correct, you have to click the correct option.
●There is no negative marking i.e there will be no deduction of marks if you clicks a wrong answer.
●At the end of test, screen will automatically present the preview about number of questions attempted and unattempted.
●You are allowed to reselect the options while taking the test only.
●You wouldn’t be allowed to make any further changes after final submission of the test.
●If you secures 80% or more, only then you will qualify for next level of test.

Information provided during registration process is assumed to be true any discrepancies in information will disqualify your candidature.\nBy clicking,I agree to accept the terms and conditions of test that I am studying in same class as mentioned while registration and I have registered only once.
Initiative by the office of \nPrincipal Scientific Advisor to \n Govt. of India
